outputs.output_descr: Southern Sudan Anti-Corruption Commission (SSACC) Capacity development initiatives will be instituted at the individual, institutional and organizational development levels. The objective of the programme is to strengthen the accountability and transparency mechanisms of the Government of South Sudan. The expected outcome is a decrease in the incidence of impunity for corrupt actions, and increased accountability for, and transparency in the use of public resources.

Southern Sudan Anti-Corruption Commission (SSACC) Capacity development initiatives will be instituted at the individual, institutional and organizational development levels. The objective of the programme is to strengthen the accountability and transparency mechanisms of the Government of South Sudan. The expected outcome is a decrease in the incidence of impunity for corrupt actions, and increased accountability for, and transparency in the use of public resources.

project_descr: Sufficient institutional and staffing capacity in the SSACC to investigate and prosecute corruption cases
